SEARCH
Package com.healthcare.billing

Class Billing

java.lang.Object
com.healthcare.billing.Billing
public class Billing extends Object
The Billing class handles the calculation of tax, discount, and the total amount for a given list of services.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Billing(int discount, int taxRate)
    Constructs a Billing object with the specified discount and tax rate.

  • Constructor Details

    • Billing

      public Billing(int discount, int taxRate)
      Constructs a Billing object with the specified discount and tax rate.
      Parameters:
      discount - The discount percentage applied to the total amount.
      taxRate - The tax rate percentage applied after the discount.

  • Method Details

    • setBillingDetails

      public void setBillingDetails(int discount, int taxRate)
      Sets the billing details including discount and tax rate.
      Parameters:
      discount - The discount percentage to be applied.
      taxRate - The tax rate percentage to be applied.

    • getDiscount

      public int getDiscount()
      Retrieves the discount percentage.
      Returns:
      The discount percentage.

    • getTaxRate

      public int getTaxRate()
      Retrieves the tax rate percentage.
      Returns:
      The tax rate percentage.

    • getTotalAmount

      public double getTotalAmount()
      Retrieves the total amount before discount and tax calculations.
      Returns:
      The total amount.

    • calculateDiscountAmount

      public double calculateDiscountAmount()
      Calculates the discount amount based on the total amount and discount percentage.
      Returns:
      The discount amount.

    • calculateTotalAmount

      public double calculateTotalAmount(List<Service> services)
      Calculates the total amount based on the list of services provided.
      Parameters:
      services - The list of services to be billed.
      Returns:
      The total amount before applying discounts and taxes.

    • calculateTaxAmount

      public double calculateTaxAmount()
      Calculates the tax amount based on the total amount after applying the discount.
      Returns:
      The tax amount to be added to the bill.

    • calculateGrandTotal

      public double calculateGrandTotal()
      Calculates the grand total after applying the discount and tax.
      Returns:
      The final amount to be paid after applying all deductions and taxes.
